author: abdel.stark
content:
We initiated the testnet, for the moment only 3 Besu nodes on this network. I am waiting for EIP-1559 support for Clique engine in Geth before deploying Geth nodes. We will likely restart this testnet many times before having something stable. Here are the urls of the stats dashboard and the block explorer:
http://eip1559-testnet.ops.pegasys.tech:3001/
http://eip1559-testnet.ops.pegasys.tech:3000/
I will share genesis later when we are ready to open to other nodes.

author: abdel.stark
content: For the moment the block period is 10 seconds but we will move to 30 seconds to have something closer to mainnet and easier to fill with 25M gas

author: timbeiko
content: If we can't fill 25M gas blocks in 15 seconds, isn't that a very bad sign for mainnet? Or is there something about the testnet setup that makes that harder than mainnet?

author: abdel.stark
content: It won't be hard to fill 25M gas blocks with smart contracts call. This is only because my fuzzer generates only values transfers.

content: If people have some simulators that deploy and generate realistic smart contract calls that would be awesome
